Reviews.Title: Port comes loose - can no longer charge phone
Reviews.Author: Jopo
Reviews.Content: After less than a year the port where you insert the charger to charge the battery came loose.  I've never dropped this phone, I've taken good care of it. When I looked this up on Sprint's message boards I found that it was a common problem. Don't bother buying this phone.  It's okay otherwise, but if you can't charge it you don't have a phone.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: JCLOSE
Reviews.Content: THE PRODUCT IS EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED UNFORTIONATLLY I LIVE IN COUNTRY AND DID NOT HAVE SERVICE WITH THIS PHONE I WOULD DEFINALTY BUY FROM THIS SELLER AGAIN.

Stylish, Dual-sliding Form Conceals Both A Full QWERTY Keyboard and A Numeric Keypad

Expand Memory Up To 32 GB To Record Longer Video Clips and Store More Photos
A Great Social Networking Phone: One Click Access To MySpace and Facebook
Supports Corporate (Outlook & Lotus) and Personal Mobile Web Email Accounts (POP3/IMAP)
